title: Towel, 1920–29
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; warp over spun, Z-twist; one end finished with warp ends knotted and clipped just above the knot; other end finished with a row of herringbone stitch
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 92 x 30.5 cm (36 1/4 x 12 in.)
description: Towel with a band of patterning on both ends.

tombstone.epitaph:
Towel, 1920–29.Medium: cotton, silk, metal-wrapped cotton
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous supplementary weft; warp over spun, Z-twist; one end finished with warp ends knotted and clipped just above the knot; other end finished with a row of herringbone stitch . 1974-92-6.
